c74object.name: fl.recall~
c74object.digest: Recall a remotely stored frame for use.
c74object.description: The frame to be recalled is determined by the storage specifed by the name parameter. The ordering input can be used to explicitly control ordering between related objects. In a multistream scenario each stream has separate storage for a given name.

entry.name: /name [instantiation string]
entry.description:
Sets the name of the storage to use.
Note that names are local to the current context.

objarg.name: name
objarg.digest: Sets the name of the storage to use
objarg.description:
Sets the name of the storage to use.
Note that names are local to the current context.

method.name: frame
method.description: Used internally by FrameLib connection routines. User messages have no effect

method.name: sync
method.description: Used internally by FrameLib connection routines. User messages have no effect

attribute.name: rt
attribute.description: Sets the realtime state for this object

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: Sets the context name for this object
